languages.text: "И еще кое-что: по приказу маршала проктор Антар назначен на краткосрочную миссию — он покинет вашу свиту на рассвете следующего дня. Это дело безотлагательной важности, Адептус Арбитес рассчитывают на ваше понимание".

"There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."
languages.original_text: "И еще кое-что: по приказу маршала проктор Антар назначен на краткосрочную миссию — он покинет вашу свиту на рассвете следующего дня. Это дело безотлагательной важности, Адептус Арбитес рассчитывают на ваше понимание".

traits.locale_text: "One other thing, Rogue Trader: by Marshal Strachs's order, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission — he is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of critical urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

"One other thing, Rogue Trader: by Marshal Strachs's order, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission — he is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of critical urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

"There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

"There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

"There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

"There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

languages.text: "Da wäre noch etwas, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}: Auf Befehl von Marschall Strachs wurde Proktor Anthar kurzfristig auf eine Mission entsandt. Er wird Euer Gefolge im Morgengrauen verlassen. Da es sich um eine äußerst wichtige Angelegenheit handelt, bittet Euch das Adeptus Arbites um Verständnis."
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Da wäre noch etwas, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}: Auf Befehl von Marschall Strachs wurde Proktor Anthar kurzfristig auf eine Mission entsandt. Er wird Euer Gefolge im Morgengrauen verlassen. Da es sich um eine äußerst wichtige Angelegenheit handelt, bittet Euch das Adeptus Arbites um Verständnis."

languages.text: « Une dernière chose, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchand} : sur ordre du maréchal Strachs, le proctor Anthar a été affecté à une mission de courte durée. Il devra quitter votre entourage à l'aube. Comme il s'agit d'une affaire des plus urgentes, l'Adeptus Arbites vous serait reconnaissant de votre compréhension. »
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: « Une dernière chose, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchand} : sur ordre du maréchal Strachs, le proctor Anthar a été affecté à une mission de courte durée. Il devra quitter votre entourage à l'aube. Comme il s'agit d'une affaire des plus urgentes, l'Adeptus Arbites vous serait reconnaissant de votre compréhension. »

languages.text: “还有另外一件事情，行商浪人。根据斯塔克斯元帅的命令，安萨监察官需要执行一项临时行动，他会在黎明时分离开您的随行人员队伍。此次行动非常紧急，法务部希望能得到您的谅解。”
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: “还有另外一件事情，行商浪人。根据斯塔克斯元帅的命令，安萨监察官需要执行一项临时行动，他会在黎明时分离开您的随行人员队伍。此次行动非常紧急，法务部希望能得到您的谅解。”

languages.text: «Una cosa más, Comerciante Independiente: por orden del Mariscal Strachs, el Procurador Anthar ha recibido una misión a corto plazo. Dejará su séquito al amanecer. Al tratarse de una situación urgente, el Adeptus Arbites le agradecería su comprensión».
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: «Una cosa más, Comerciante Independiente: por orden del Mariscal Strachs, el Procurador Anthar ha recibido una misión a corto plazo. Dejará su séquito al amanecer. Al tratarse de una situación urgente, el Adeptus Arbites le agradecería su comprensión».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、もうひとつあります。ストラッチス将帥の命により、アンサール代理人に短期任務が与えられました。彼は夜明けにあなたの従者と別れることになっています。緊急の任務ですので、高等裁定局はあなたのご理解に感謝いたします」
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、もうひとつあります。ストラッチス将帥の命により、アンサール代理人に短期任務が与えられました。彼は夜明けにあなたの従者と別れることになっています。緊急の任務ですので、高等裁定局はあなたのご理解に感謝いたします」

languages.text: "Başka bir husus daha var Hür Tacir: Miralay Strachs'ın emriyle Üsteğmen Anthar'a kısa süreli bir görev verildi. Şafakta maiyetinizden ayrılacak. Mesele son derece acildir, Adeptus Arbites anlayışınızı bekler."
languages.original_text: "There is one other thing, Rogue Trader: by the order of Marshal Strachs, Proctor Anthar has been assigned a short-term mission. He is to take his leave of your retinue at dawn. As this is a matter of extreme urgency, the Adeptus Arbites would appreciate your understanding."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir husus daha var Hür Tacir: Miralay Strachs'ın emriyle Üsteğmen Anthar'a kısa süreli bir görev verildi. Şafakta maiyetinizden ayrılacak. Mesele son derece acildir, Adeptus Arbites anlayışınızı bekler."
